ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] I can't stinkin' log into Everquest!
ygData.msgSnippet: A lot of people have been having issues like that. There is a thing where you can load from their website or soemthing. I downloaded it and started trying to
ygData.messageBody:
A lot of people have been having issues like that. There is a thing where
you can load from their website or soemthing. I downloaded it and started
trying to use it but it said it was going to take 60+ HOURS to dl the files.
So I cancelled and used the regular patcher and it started working and
finally loaded that stupid EQGfx_D8.DLL file. Arg.
Anyone else having a problem with a cursor appearing in the center of the
screen and staying there nonstop?
luv,
-Su

> I hate this new patch downloading thing because it freezes so I want
> you to send me email on how to go in if you experenced the same
> problem. See for a level 8 wizard named Dallwinx on the Antonis Bayle
> (European server).
>
>
> Email me at: Desking09@...
>
> Thanks!
